Mapa interativo com a região do Banco dos Abrolhos:

```{r}
dir_pol <- "C:/OSGEO4~1/bin"

library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(rgeos)
library(svMisc)

pol <- readOGR(dsn=dir_pol,layer="Área do Banco dos Abrolhos e Royal") %>%
  spTransform(., CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"))


# Background 2: World Imagery
leaflet()  %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.OceanBasemap) %>% 
  #addTiles() %>% 
  addPolygons(data = pol, col="Red", fill = TRUE) %>% 
  setView(lng = -35, lat=-18, zoom = 5) %>% 
  addMiniMap()

```
